data.comment: The match has started, with Anderlecht kicking-off.
Anderlecht's Kemar Lawrence has been booked in Antwerp.
In the minute 29, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ismaila Coulibaly.
Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a first substitution, with Dario Van Den Buijs replacing Pierre Bourdin.
At Olympisch Stadion, Frederic Frans has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Mohamed Halaimia is replacing Joren Dom for the home team.
The second-half is underway. Beerschot with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Yari Verschaeren with Michel Vlap. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Kompany.
An attacking Beerschot player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Raphael Holzhauser puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 60, Peter Zulj (Anderlecht) gets a yellow card.
The away team replace Peter Zulj with Francis Amuzu.
Tarik Tissoudali (Beerschot) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 80, Beerschot make their third substitution with Blessing Eleke replacing Musashi Suzuki.
Anderlecht are back in the match in Antwerp. Lukas Nmecha has scored to make it 2-1.
That's full-time at Olympisch Stadion. The final score is 2-1.
Nany Dimata is on a sub for Paul Mukairu for Anderlecht.
